about_the_game: Krytix is a game taking place in a futuristic combat simulator where you wake up from unconsciousness with no clue about the origin of your situation, run 'n gun your way out of the levels and discover the purpose of your ultimate quest. Run 'n gun across different levels where you are hunted down by mysterious highly technological robots who will not hesitate to shoot you down on sight, sneak through levels or destroy everything on your path are the choices for all levels, bringing you to a different outcome for every levels. Use technological weaponry, hacking powers and elemental magic to not only defeat your enemies but also interact with the physics-based environment. Props, rag-dolls and destructible environment.

short_description: Wall runs, explosions, fast-paced shooting, physics and high-speed gameplay, that is the recipe used in the making of Krytix, a 3D single player game. Story divided through chapters, each of them taking place in different environments with new enemies and new mechanics.
